original: intros. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_init, allEntries_votesWithLog in *. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_init in *. unfold votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface in vvwlci. simpl in vvwlci. unfold votesWithLog_term_sanity_interface in vwltsi. simpl in vwltsi. unfold votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface, votesWithLog_term_sanity_interface in vvwlci, vwltsi. destruct rri as [refined_raft_net_invariant]. specialize (refined_raft_net_invariant P net IHn0 IHn1 IHn2 IHn3 IHn4 IHn5 IHn6 IHn7 IHn8 H rri0). apply refined_raft_net_invariant. apply H0.
